Package cdx.opencdx.commons.exceptions

Class OpenCDXException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
java.lang.RuntimeException
cdx.opencdx.commons.exceptions.OpenCDXException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
OpenCDXAborted, OpenCDXBadRequest, OpenCDXConflict, OpenCDXDataLoss, OpenCDXFailedPrecondition, OpenCDXForbidden, OpenCDXGatewayTimeout, OpenCDXGrpcJsonConversion, OpenCDXInternal, OpenCDXInternalServerError, OpenCDXNotAcceptable, OpenCDXNotFound, OpenCDXOutOfRange, OpenCDXServiceUnavailable, OpenCDXTooManyRequests, OpenCDXUnauthorized, OpenCDXUnimplemented, OpenCDXUnsupportedMediaType
public abstract class OpenCDXException extends RuntimeException
OpenCDXException is the abstraction to any OpenCDX related exceptions.

      domain - Class Name exception created in

      message - Message indicating the failure reason.
      cause - Throwable that was the cause of this exception.
      enableSuppression - Boolean to indicate allow suppression.
      writableStackTrace - Boolean to indicate writeable stack trace.
